params._duration: Duration in seconds from current time

returns._0: True if poll is open, false otherwise

params.optionIndex: Index of the option to vote for

returns._0: True if approval is needed, false otherwise

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: Array of vote counts corresponding to each option

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.optionIndex: Index of the option to vote for

getRequiredApproval().notice: Get required approval amount for voting

getWinnerOption(uint256).notice: Get the winning option of a poll

hasMintedForPoll(uint256,address).notice: Track if user has minted token for a specific poll: pollId => user => hasMinted

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Track if a user has voted in a poll: pollId => user => hasVoted

isPollOpen(uint256).notice: Check if a poll is currently open for voting

mintAndVote(uint256,uint256).notice: Mint token and vote in a single transaction

mintTokenForPoll(uint256).notice: Mint voting token for a specific poll

needsTokenApproval(address).notice: Check if user needs to approve tokens for voting

pollResults(uint256).notice: Get poll results (vote counts for each option)

setVotingToken(address).notice: Set the VotingToken contract address (can only be called once)

vote(uint256,uint256).notice: Vote for an option using its index (gas-optimized)

voteCounts(uint256,string).notice: Track vote counts for each option in a poll: pollId => optionString => voteCount
